original_text: And if anyone would sue you and take your tunic, let him have your cloak as well.
korean_text: 또 너를 고발하여 속옷을 가지고자 하는 자에게 겉옷까지도 가지게 하며

sentences.original_text: And if anyone would sue you and take your tunic,
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 너를 고소하여 네 속옷을 빼앗으면,

sentences.original_text: let him have your cloak as well.
